bibl.title: Notes on Three Greek Magical Texts.
bibl.note: 1. Phoebe, who delights in arrows (Suppl. Mag. I, 49, 72-73). - 2. The Ialda-Logos: Some Emendations of Preisendanz by Preisendanz (P.G.M. I, 203-207; IV, 1196-1199 and XIII, 971-974). - 3. Osiris Nophrioth (Suppl. Mag. I, 45, 12-15). <Ialda>
FARAONE Christopher A., Notes on Three Greek Magical Texts.
